Powerscript APIÂ¶

PowerScript is the development environment of the system, which enables you to develop add ons, user exits, stand alone scripts or complex applications based on or integrated with the CONTACT Elements Platform. This document only describes the APIs that are important for the CONTACT Virtual Product package. A powerscript manual is part of the CONTACT Elements Platform documenation.
